text: Hey everyone, I have an odd question today about something that IS WORKING but it shouldn't: I submit forms in my portal from the integrations we build using the API and  I just noticed that one of our developers created the custom property in HubSpot as "product_licence" (British spelling)  while the API call built by another developer was trying to submit the form with a "product_license" (US spelling) field and... it's working anyways!  Any clues?
Have you checked to make sure there arenâ€™t actually two different properties?
Hey guys, I was wondering whether anyone had had any success integrating the Workday API ( `<https://community.workday.com/api>` ) with HubSpot before?
I was about to create a new property when I found that the existing one was working OK :man-shrugging:
